Class VendingMachine

Object
VendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
The VendingMachine class represents a vending machine that holds various items and accepts money denominations for transactions. It keeps track of the machine's name, the items in the machine, the current balance, and the transaction history.

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(String name, float price, float calories, int initStock)
      Adds an item to the vending machine with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item
      price - the price of the item
      calories - the calorie count of the item
      initStock - the initial stock of the item
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully added, false if the maximum item count is reached

    • addMoneyDenomination

      public void addMoneyDenomination(MoneyDenomination denomination)
      Adds a money denomination to the vending machine's balance.
      Parameters:
      denomination - the money denomination to add

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(Item item)
      Adds a transaction to the transaction history.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to add to the transaction history

    • transactionSummary

      public void transactionSummary(ArrayList<Item> transactionHistory)
      Displays a summary of the transaction history and calculates the total earnings.
      Parameters:
      transactionHistory - the list of items in the transaction history

    • produceChange

      public ArrayList<MoneyDenomination> produceChange(float cost, float payment)
      Calculates and returns the change to be given based on the cost and payment made.
      Parameters:
      cost - the cost of the item
      payment - the payment made
      Returns:
      the list of money denominations representing the change

    • dispenseChange

      public boolean dispenseChange(ArrayList<MoneyDenomination> changeList, float cost, float payment)
      Dispenses the change to the user and verifies if the vending machine has sufficient balance.
      Parameters:
      changeList - the list of money denominations representing the change
      cost - the cost of the item
      payment - the payment made
      Returns:
      true if the change is successfully dispensed, false if the machine has insufficient balance
